biography:
Marcello Peschiera lives and works in Miami, Florida. His practice is rooted in photography and moves fluidly between music videography, portraiture, and a lifelong obsession with film. With a deep connection to the music industry, Marcello collaborates closely with leading directors, colourists, and producers to craft imagery that captures the emotion, culture, and energy surrounding the artists he works with.

Marcello is also the founder of Bellow’s Film Lab—a cult-loved photography hub servicing thousands of photographers across the US. The lab offers end-to-end film processing, scanning, and printing, alongside a curated selection of highly sought-after film stocks and vintage cameras.
